[LeetCode] Restore IP Addresses

Nov 14, 2014
5 minute read

Restore IP Addresses

恢复字符串所有可能的IP地址，可以回溯或者直接字符串处理。

回溯法

每次取分割出来最多三位进行判断，如果符合就继续分割剩余部分，最多分四次。思路比较简单，但是对点的处理导致有些烦，代码如下：

 1 class Solution {
 2 public:
 3     string solution = "";
 4     vector<string> res;
 5 
 6     vector<string> restoreIpAddresses(string s) {
 7         generateIpAddress(0, s);
 8 
 9         return res;
10     }
11 
12     void generateIpAddress(int step, string restStr)
13     {
14         if (restStr.length() < 4 - step || restStr.length() > 3 * (4 - step)) return ;
15         if (step == 4 && restStr == "")
16         {
17             res.push_back(solution.substr(0, solution.length() - 1));
18             return ;
19         }
20         for (int i = 1; i <= 3 && i <= restStr.length(); ++i)
21         {
22             string seg = restStr.substr(0, i);
23             if (isValid(seg))
24             {
25                 solution += seg + '.';
26                 generateIpAddress(step + 1, restStr.substr(i));
27                 solution = solution.substr(0, solution.length() - i - 1);
28             }
29         }
30     }
31 
32     bool isValid(string s)
33     {
34         int length = s.size();
35         if (length > 1 && s[0] == '0') return false;
36         if (stoi(s) <= 255) return true;
37         return false;
38     }
39 };

直接处理

遍历三个点所有可能的位置，并且判断产生的IP地址是否合理，三层循环解决，代码如下：

 1 class Solution {
 2 public:
 3     vector<string> restoreIpAddresses(string s) {
 4         vector<string> res;
 5 
 6         int length = s.length();
 7         if (length < 4 || length > 12) return res;
 8 
 9         for (int i = 1; i <= 3; ++i)
10             for (int j = i + 1; j <= i + 4; ++j)
11                 for (int k = j + 1; k <= j + 4; ++k)
12                 {
13                     if (length - k < 1 || length - k > 3) continue;
14                     string first = s.substr(0, i);
15                     string second = s.substr(i, j - i);
16                     string third = s.substr(j, k - j);
17                     string fourth = s.substr(k);
18                     if (isValid(first) && isValid(second) && isValid(third) && isValid(fourth))
19                         res.push_back(first + '.' + second + '.' + third + '.' + fourth);
20                 }
21 
22         return res;
23     }
24 
25     bool isValid(string s)
26     {
27         int length = s.size();
28         if (length > 1 && s[0] == '0') return false;
29         if (stoi(s) <= 255) return true;
30         return false;
31     }
32 };
